Trackers

Class DHTTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trackers.Tracker
      • Trackers.DHTTracker

  • public class DHTTracker
extends Tracker
    Implementation of DHT tracker. Hey, now we can use magnet links! periodic work is done with doWork() We search till either we cant find any closer This class is a bit bloated. Some of my worse work. :-| Just read my docs. Most of this ends up being implemented and non-tested due to lack of Upnp behind this nat.
    Author:
    wiselion
